resources.string: Couldn\'t detect Spotify App\nPlease install the Spotify app to proceed further
What can we help you with today?
Could not connect to the internet

Therabeat aims to provide a therapeutic music listening experience. It is geared towards helping patients get better while listening to the music that they enjoy.

This project is headed by:
Dr. Yune S. Lee
Department of Speech, Language, and Hearing
School of Behavioral and Brain Sciences
The University of Texas at Dallas

Dr. Dawn Owens
Program Director, Business Analytics and Information Technology and Systems Programs
Naveen Jindal School of Management
The University of Texas at Dallas

Developer Contact:
Anurag Wasankar
Graduate Student
Erik Jonsson School of Computer Science
The University of Texas at Dallas

Special thanks to Jesper S Bajwa.
Swipe down from the top to minimize the music player and continue using the app for viewing analytics, etc\nTap the player again to maximize it
Refresh the layout by swiping down from the top of Home Page and Analytics Page to view the latest data
Click to diconnect your Spotify Account from Therabeat
